name: PlatformActionList

fields.name: actionListContext
fields.description: The context of the action list.

fields.name: platformActionListItems
fields.description: The actions in the platform action list.

fields.name: relatedSourceEntity
fields.description: When the actionListContext property is “RelatedList” or” “RelatedListRecord”, this field represents the API name of the related list to which the action belongs.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.PlatformActionList.

description: Represents the list of actions, and their order, that display in the Salesforce mobile action bar for the layout.
